1. Graph is undirected.

2. deg = [15, 9, 12, 13, 13, 18, 18, 18, 17, 20, 15, 16, 11, 18, 12, 15, 12, 16, 13, 14, 14, 12, 13, 22, 12, 23, 12, 12, 25, 11, 13, 11, 12, 14, 11, 10, 11, 13, 19, 12, 24, 15, 10, 14, 7, 13, 14, 17, 10, 17, 20, 13, 16, 16, 11, 9, 8, 19, 8, 9, 9, 13, 11, 15, 11, 21, 12, 15, 13, 15, 13, 14, 11, 13, 16, 12, 11, 13, 19, 15, 16, 13, 13, 11, 18, 4, 14, 12, 13, 16, 16, 15, 12, 16, 10, 12, 16, 12, 13, 11, 21, 12, 14, 12, 15, 17, 11, 18, 14, 17, 16, 11, 13, 15, 16, 18, 14, 11, 11, 17, 15, 13, 8, 10, 22, 11, 17, 15, 17, 16, 19, 13, 16, 13, 10, 20, 14, 16, 12, 10, 12, 13, 11, 8, 16, 12, 19, 14, 19, 17, 9, 12, 16, 17, 14, 15, 13, 15, 11, 9, 14, 12, 14, 15, 24, 16, 21, 14, 15, 15, 14, 15, 15, 18, 15, 15, 15, 8, 19, 23, 15, 14, 17, 19, 11, 16, 17, 11, 10, 16, 12, 15, 17, 16, 11, 11, 20, 14, 9, 17, 12, 17, 12, 9, 23, 17, 13, 14, 12, 11, 11, 13, 16, 12, 16, 14, 16, 15, 13, 12, 19, 16, 17, 18, 20, 17, 10, 17, 18, 14, 12, 12, 22, 11, 12, 16, 10, 13, 15, 12, 17, 18, 13, 11, 15, 11, 20, 15, 12, 16, 15, 13, 16, 19, 21, 18, 12, 15, 19, 6, 8, 14, 13, 13, 12, 18, 12, 13, 16, 16, 16, 13, 7, 17, 13, 22, 10, 10, 10, 18, 10, 20, 15, 13, 9, 11, 11, 8, 16, 21, 14, 10, 18, 12, 15, 16, 12, 15, 13, 15, 11, 19, 16, 16, 14, 15, 19, 18, 9, 19, 17, 12, 12, 18, 15, 13, 11, 16, 14, 13, 13, 10, 10, 11, 17, 8, 9, 11, 16, 17, 18, 19, 14, 13, 16, 12, 8, 12, 17, 9, 18, 14, 9, 10, 7, 15, 16, 17, 10, 11, 11, 12, 12, 14, 18, 13, 9, 11, 17, 15, 15, 15, 13, 12, 17, 15, 18, 14, 13, 11, 14, 10, 10, 15, 13, 12, 6, 21, 13, 9, 14, 11, 12, 16, 19, 16, 13, 13, 14, 11, 12, 10, 12, 19, 14, 18, 12, 9, 12, 19, 9, 17, 18, 14, 16, 11, 11, 20, 11, 14, 13, 8, 16, 15, 12, 21, 18, 18, 12, 12, 17, 16, 12, 12, 11, 12, 10, 15, 13, 13, 14, 16, 8, 12, 24, 14, 12, 13, 20, 13, 18, 15, 14, 13, 15, 21, 15, 14, 16, 12, 14, 8, 15, 15, 16, 15, 9, 19, 12, 12, 16, 11, 6, 14, 17, 9, 15, 13, 15, 9, 17, 14, 10, 13, 13, 15, 11, 12, 12, 19, 19, 18, 10, 14, 9, 6, 12, 13, 18, 12, 23, 13, 11, 11, 10, 14, 23, 16, 10, 17].

Graph is not connected
